main event: On 13 July 1962, an observer in Springfield, Virginia, sighted a silvery disc-shaped object approximately 25-30 feet in diameter traveling at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The object performed three complete stop and go maneuvers, stopping momentarily before accelerating to a high speed,The object changed direction and altitude abruptly during the sighting,The sighting lasted for about 1.5 minutes,The weather was clear during the observation,The object was estimated to be 12 miles away during the sighting.
witness description: A 45-year-old male observer with extensive science background and interest in astronomy.
